plays.text: Goal scored by Sergei Zholtok unassisted
Goal scored by Cliff Ronning assisted by Marian Gaborik and Andrew Brunette
Penalty to Eric Cairns 2 minutes for Roughing Kyle Wanvig
Penalty to Matt Johnson 5 minutes for Fighting Eric Cairns
Penalty to Eric Cairns 5 minutes for Fighting Matt Johnson
Penalty to Ladislav Benysek 2 minutes for High Sticking Radek Martinek
Goal scored by Mark Parrish assisted by Alexei Yashin and Adrian Aucoin
Goal scored by Michael Peca assisted by Jason Blake and Arron Asham
Penalty to Andrei Zyuzin 2 minutes for High Sticking Claude Lapointe
Penalty to Pascal Dupuis 2 minutes for Tripping Sven Butenschon
Goal scored by Mark Parrish assisted by Sven Butenschon and Jason Wiemer
Penalty to Brad Brown 2 minutes for Roughing Adrian Aucoin
Penalty to Arron Asham 2 minutes for Interference Filip Kuba
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Arron Asham
Penalty to Jason Wiemer 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dwayne Roloson
Penalty to Marian Gaborik 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Blake
Penalty to Matt Johnson 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Dave Scatchard unassisted
